summary: Complete testing of new 'Condições do Mar' design with 4 cards (Clima, Ondas, Marés, Lua). All features working correctly. Backend 100% (15/15 tests), Frontend 100%.

features_tested.details: Shows 26°C, sensação 28°C, umidade 78%, vento 11 km/h ESE, chuva 35%, nascer 05:18, pôr 17:45
Shows altura 1.3m, máx 1.8m, direção ESE, período 11s, água 27°C, classificação 'Bom'
Shows Lua Crescente, 51% iluminada, influência 'Marés moderadas', pesca 'Boa'
Shows altura 1.3m, direção ESE, período 11s with summary text
Button scrolls to 'Condições do Mar' section correctly
Hamburger menu hidden on desktop, visible on mobile (390x844)
Returns wave_height, wave_height_max, wave_direction, swell_period, water_temp, surf_rating, best_time
Returns new fields: wind_direction, rain_chance, sunrise, sunset
Returns 3 tide entries with type, time, height

context_for_next_testing_agent: New 'Condições do Mar' section with 4 cards fully tested. All APIs return MOCKED/estimated data (OPENWEATHER_API_KEY not configured). Wave height varies based on time of day (math.sin calculation). Login: admin/admin123.

mocked_apis_list: /api/weather - Returns estimated data (temp=26°C, wind_direction=ESE) when OPENWEATHER_API_KEY not set
/api/waves - Returns estimated surf conditions (wave_height varies by hour, direction=ESE)
/api/tides - Returns fallback data (tabuademares.com API returns 403 Forbidden)
